mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (name, isNotice, contents, createTime, views, categoryNo, userNo, updateTime) VALUES (#{name}, #{isNotice}, #{contents}, #{createTime}, #{views}, #{categoryNo}, #{userNo}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET name = #{name}, contents = #{contents}, views = #{views}, categoryNo = #{categoryNo}, userNo = #{userNo}, updateTime = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}
